posts.title: How to Build a Responsive Web Design with Flexbox
posts.body: In this guide, we'll explore the core concepts of Flexbox and how you can use it to create responsive web layouts. From aligning items horizontally and vertically to dynamically adjusting element sizes, Flexbox offers a powerful way to structure modern web applications.

posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures: A Complete Guide
posts.body: Closures are one of JavaScript's most powerful features. They allow functions to remember the variables from their lexical scope even after the function has finished executing. In this post, we'll break down closures with examples and practical use cases.
